Reverse Engineering: If it involves working out how things work under the hood - you will find it here.
Hardware Hacking: Taking control over hardware and making it do things that it normally wouldn't or shouldn't.
Hardware Repair: Diagnosing and repairing various kinds of hardware.
Mobile: Everything related to mobile phones and other portables.
Embedded: Embedded systems which are usually more powerful than a lightbulb.
Computers: Working with the big calculators, both the hardware and software.
Software: Projects strictly related to software development.
